name: spruce-cli-workspace
description: The DX tools used to build next generation experiences on the Spruce Experience Platform. ðŸ’»

scripts.clean.all: yarn clean.cache ; yarn clean.dependencies && yarn clean.build
scripts.clean.build: for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.build; cd ../..; done
scripts.clean.cache: for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.cache; cd ../..; done
scripts.clean.dependencies: rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json yarn.lock && for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.dependencies; cd ../..; done
scripts.rebuild: yarn clean.all && yarn install && yarn build.dev; yarn cache.tests
scripts.upgrade.packages: rm -f yarn.lock && yarn ;  yarn fix.lint ; true
scripts.upgrade.packages.workspaces: for d in packages/*; do cd $d; yarn-upgrade-all; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages.all: yarn add -D lerna yarn-upgrade-all -W  && yarn upgrade.packages.workspaces && yarn upgrade.packages
scripts.upgrade.packages.test: yarn upgrade.packages.all && yarn lint && yarn build.dev && yarn test
scripts.watch.rebuild: yarn clean.all && yarn install && yarn watch.build.dev
